One morning you get a dream telling you that you can just think of shrinking and shrink, and when shrunk you will be invulnerable and immune to pain. You think it's just a weird dream manifesting from your shrinking fetish, but it turns out to be true when you shrink to half your size...

NEW RULE: THERE CAN BE SOME AWARE CONTENT, BUT I WILL NOT ALLOW CRUEL GIANTESSES. AGAIN, YOU'RE TRYING TO ENJOY YOURSELF.
